mapper.select: /* 포인트샵 아이템 목록 조회 */ SELECT ps_cd, ps_cate_cd, ps_nm, file_idx, ps_price, admin_id, reg_ymd FROM point_shop LIMIT #{rowPerPage} OFFSET #{offset};
/* 포인트샵 카테고리 조회 */ SELECT cate_cd, cate_nm FROM pointshop_categories ORDER BY cate_nm DESC;
/* 특정 아이템 조회 */ SELECT * FROM point_shop ps WHERE ps.ps_cd = #{itemCd};
mapper.update:
/* 아이템 정보 수정 */ UPDATE point_shop
ps_cate_cd =#{itemCate},
ps_nm=#{itemName},
file_idx=#{fileIdx},
ps_price=#{itemPrice},
admin_id=#{adminId},
reg_ymd=#{regYmd},
WHERE ps_cd = #{itemCd};
mapper.insert: /*아이템 추가*/ INSERT INTO point_shop ( ps_cd, ps_cate_cd, ps_nm, file_idx, ps_price, admin_id, reg_ymd ) VALUES ( #{itemCd}, #{itemCate}, #{itemName}, #{fileIdx}, #{itemPrice}, #{adminId}, CURDATE() );
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM point_shop ps INNER JOIN pointshop_logs pl ON ps.ps_cd = pl.ps_cd WHERE ps.ps_cd=#{itemCd};
